Content.Text:
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've arrived!
<PAGE>
This is your destination, the
<GREEN>Land of the East</GREEN>.
Looks very different from back home, eh?
<PAGE>
You have until <BLUE>10 PM</BLUE> here,
then I'll come to call you home.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've arrived!
<PAGE>
This is your destination, the
<GREEN>Southern Island</GREEN>. Whew, it's hot!
I'll have a cool drink while I wait.
<PAGE>
You have until <BLUE>9 PM</BLUE> here,
then I'll come to call you home.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've arrived!
<PAGE>
This is your destination, <GREEN>Snowland</GREEN>.
Achoo! Brrrrr!
One of the world's coldest places!
<PAGE>
You have until <BLUE>9 PM</BLUE> here,
then I'll come to call you home.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've arrived!
<PAGE>
This is your destination, the <GREEN>Ancient
Ruins</GREEN>. I'll try to find a rare
souvenir for Camellia and Hina.
<PAGE>
You have until <BLUE>8 PM</BLUE> here,
then I'll come to call you home.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The <GREEN>Land of the East</GREEN> is a
popular tourist destination.
My wife loves it here too.
<PAGE>
The buildings here are distinctive, and
the gardens are designed like nothing
you've seen elsewhere!  Enjoy!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As you can see, the <GREEN>Southern Island</GREEN>
is a paradise of endless summer.
<PAGE>
My wife and I love to put on our
swimsuits and frolic in the sea here.
<PAGE>
The waters are so crystal-clear that
you can see the fish as you swim.
<PAGE>
The fishing here is probably great.
Enjoy yourself!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<GREEN>Snowland</GREEN> is famous for
its frigid weather.
<PAGE>
But along with the cold, it has mineral-
rich ice everywhere.
Drinks made with this ice are legendary!
<PAGE>
Perhaps I'll bring back a souvenir!
Well, enjoy your stay!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The <GREEN>Ancient Ruins</GREEN> have
profound historical importance, making
this a popular destination for scholars.
<PAGE>
My wife always looks forward to
souvenirs from this place!
<PAGE>
Perhaps I'll take her a little gift.
Well, have a good time!
